sentence.Network_en: As a resource both of medicine and food, purslane has vast development future.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French porcelaine, probably from Latin porcil(l)aca, variant of portulaca, influenced by French porcelaine 'porcelain'

means.word_mean: 1. a plant of the family Portulacaceae having fleshy succulent obovate leaves often grown as a potherb or salad herb; a weed in some areas
